item.description:
You are invited to a pARTy!!!

Saturday Nov. 10 at 6:30pm

Cumberland, RI
.
Explore your creative side – have fun – learn something new.
Have fun playing with paints and other art supplies! 
You will complete your own original artwork to keep or gift! 
Price includes all art supplies.
No experience needed to enjoy this pARTy!!!

  BYOB- please bring your own beverage.

 Cost is $25 cash each, or  $15 cash with an appetizer or dessert to share.  If you are bringing a dish please confirm that with Germaine and arrive 10 minutes early.

Please RSVP to ggerie@cox.net or call Germaine at 401- 333-4526
 Space is limited.

--
item.name: get creative!
